alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Newton (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 2:47PM CDT until June 25 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Newton County in north central Arkansas... Northeastern Johnson County in western Arkansas... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 246 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Walnut, or 19 miles southwest of Jasper, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Walnut... Rosetta... Devils Knob... Wayton... Mossville... Salus... Fort Douglas... Crossroad... Fallsville... Swain... Deer... Dixon Ridge... Cowell... Nail... Arbaugh... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
